text: Stuart Cornfeld (November 15, 1952 - June 26, 2020) was an American movie producer, and actor. He was business partners with Ben Stiller in the company, Red Hour Productions. He was born in Tarzana, California. He was known for producing Zoolander, Tropic Thunder and DodgeBall: A True Underdog Story. Cornfeld died on June 26, 2020 from cancer at the age of 67. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1952 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in the United States Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from California Category:Movie producers from California
title: Stuart Cornfeld
